## R Markdown

```{eviews mychunk,sagir="new",save_options="t=png,d=300",dev="t=pdf",prompt=T,dev.args="axis(b) font(40,b)",eval=TRUE,fig.cap="somefigure",fig.subcap=c("A figure","Another figure")}
#| fig.show: new
#| save_options: "t=png,-c"

wfcreate(wf=sagiru,page=mati) m 2000 2025
genr y=@cumsum(nrnd)
genr x=@cumsum(nrnd)
genr z=@cumsum(nrnd)
graph gra2.line z  
graph grap1.line y
freeze(grap,mode=overwrite) x.line
equation ols.ls y c x

wfsave mychunk
```

# R plots



```{r label,sagir="new"}
print(knitr::opts_current$get("sagir"))
print(knitr::opts_current$get("fig.show"))
y=cumsum(rnorm(100))
x=cumsum(rnorm(100))

plot(x,y)
```

```{r eview-graph}
data=data.frame(y=runif(100),x=runif(100))
eviews_graph(data,save_path = "",frequency = "m",start_date = 1990,group = F,options = "m")

```
